==Trivia==
===Etymology=== 
*Quahuacan Cliff might be a reference to ''[https://aztecglyphs.wired-humanities.org/content/cuauhhuacan-mdz32r Cuauhhuacan]'', a place name in {{w|Nahuatl}} which consists of the word ''{{wt|cuahuitl}}'' meaning "tree" and ''{{wt|cuauhtli}}'' meaning "eagle."
